::Grounded::
"I beleive it to be a memory relapse...I remember many test results
like this back on Cybertron. I really cannot do anything but get him
into a bed and maybe perhaps tie him up should he wake up and be his
old self."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Trinity:
>
> Trinity was sobbing while she ran and she tried to find someone who
> help Grounded carry BH to a room. She found Nightlight, who felt
> worry when she saw TRinity crys.
>
> "What's going on little-one?" said the femme while she hugged
> Trinity.
>
> "Burning Hammer... Burning Hammer.." sobbed Trinity "He needs help...
> He.. Grounded is with him... Follow me"
>
> Trinity ran and leaded Nightlight where Grounded was, as soon as
> Nightlight arrived there and saw Burning Hammer unconceus, she asked
> to Grounded "What's happened here?"
>
>
>
